features: CLEAR GENIUS CLARIFYING TONER + SERUM: This clear 2-in-1 toner and purifying serum is scented with invigorating tea tree.

DOUBLE DUTY PORE CLEARING: Is it a skin clarifying toner? Or a pore purifying serum? It's both! This double-duty formula works to tone and clear congested pores while working as a leave-on treatment too.

CLARITY 5 COMPLEX: Powered by Bliss' powerhouse Clarity 5 Complex, a blend of BHA (a.k.a. Salicylic Acid), witch hazel, niacinamide, zinc PCA and cica to cleanse, clear, soothe and purify skin and pores

SIMPLIFY YOUR SKINCARE REGIMEN: You don't need separate toners and serum to take on spots, blackheads and blemishes, you just need this 2-in-1! The leave-on treatment is a game-changer for clogged pores and stubborn spots.

HOW TO APPLY: Gently press down on pump and apply with a cotton pad (we recommend the reusable kind!) to clean, dry skin morning and night. Follow with moisturizer if desired. All skin types, especially oily and problem skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped my redness
reviews.reviewText: I personally don't like having a complicated skin care routine, but this is nice to reduce redness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I see this as an absolute win
reviews.reviewText: So I’ll start by saying this product is not what I THOUGHT it was gonna be. When I think of toner, I think if an astringent, and it’s usually quite drying. This is super thick and leaves my skin feeling not quite squeaky clean (as I’d usually get from an astringent), but I’m not mad because the results still looks great. Also the applicator is so so so great.I have obnoxious skin, and my pregnancy has caused nonstop breakouts that NO PRODUCTS HAVE BEEN ABLE TO RELIEVE. Except this one. I looked in the mirror at work this morning and my pores almost looked BLURRED, like I had a filter on ??? And 6 months into my pregnancy I finally see a GLOW.Along with consistent face washing with a gentle cleanser, my skin is on a great track to actually being better without makeup.Well done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good stuff but…
reviews.reviewText: I really like this Bliss pure genius clarifying toner & serum. It doesn’t leave you feeling sticky or greasy or dry. However, you have to be a pure genius to get the bloody stuff out of the bottle. Try it right side up makes a mess everywhere. Try it upside down it won’t come out. I feel like a lot is getting wasted b-c of packaging design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I play roller derby and wear a headset at work. No matter how hard I clean and sanitize my helmet straps and headset- and my face, I always seem to break out on my jawline and under my chin, coupled with good ol hormonal breakouts once a month.I've tried all the hacks and gone thru the motions and potions and this one kind of edged all the others out for me.It cleared things up, quickly, and keeps things clear. I waited for some sort of purge at the 2 week mark, it was miniscule, if that. What was once a complicated routine of 6-9 products that ended with stickering my face with at least a dozen zit patches has now decreased to a gentle cleanser and this serum. I bought another one because I love this product so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SAVED MY SKIN!!
reviews.reviewText: I hope this doesn’t jinx it but this stuff literally single-handedly fixed my skin. I saw results after the first use and continue to see them weeks later. I have oily, acne-prone skin and since I’ve started using this I’ve had almost no new blemishes. I would also get these tiny little bumps on certain parts of my face and this has cleared them away. I feel like my skin looks smoother and brighter. I use it morning and night and haven’t had any irritation or dryness. I don’t feel like it controls oil but that’s fine for me as it wasn’t my main concern. I was put off at first by the texture because it’s a bit thicker than I’m used to, but I just use it more like a serum than a toner. In my experience if you try to pump it directly onto a cotton pad it will kind of squish out everywhere; I saw someone recommend pumping some out with your fingers then tipping it onto the pad and that’s worked for me. It’s seriously amazing, I would recommend it to anyone and everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I received my package it was in the mailbox and opened. Delivered to neighbor.The bliss product had been leaking and the top does not close.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had received the wrong bottle and I had contacted them about the issue, they handled the problem splendidly and I will be buying again.This is my favorite toner + serum ever, it had cleared my dry, psoriasis prone skin before, and I am so excited to have my dewy skin back.I usually use after taking a shower or exfoliating my face. Thank you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: Found a better price on Amazon. I've been using this for a while and love it.It really cleans my skin and helps prevent breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 21, 2022

reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this product the fact they've merged a toner and serum into one and its gentle has my attention! The pump works fine I found the texture a little daunting the first two uses however what I found helpful was to pump approx 1/² pump onto the pump then tip the gel onto clean fingers or a cotton round once I get it on I slightly fold the cotton round in half without squeezing it so the gel 'sticks' and then I swipe. Sounds like a process but it's barely a 2 second action. I find that it helps it spread much better across the face because it's covering more of the cotton round and it isn't slippery. I don't find there to be any overpowering scent or irritation. Having reactive sensitive skin this is a rare find for me. I would recommend this to anyone but even more so to those younger people with acne or blackheads as it is still so gentle. Even if you're just applying it directly on the affected areas only I'm sure you will see results without further damage to your skin.
